short_description: ” Martijn Wisselink, PTTEP “We are very happy how the C-Kore units worked on our installation campaigns.
long_description: ” Martijn Wisselink, PTTEP “We are very happy how the C-Kore units worked on our installation campaigns. Subsea fault-finding, installation and decommissioning tasks have used downlines of dubious condition or burdensome platform-led testing. Eliminate lengthy delays associated with platform-led testing by bringing all work under the control of the intervention vessel.
